channel.title: What I wrote
channel.description:
So I was looking at my previous blogs which all consist of writing and some form of poetry? I came across this and thought it was pretty interesting. I enjoyed re-reading what I wrote, hopefully some of you see the same light in it.
[quote="Cody"][b]"What happens when we die?" "[i]Well, what happens when you live?[/i]"
"We... live?" "[i]Okay, so same concept[/i]."
"Well, I mean do you go somewhere, orrr..." "[i]Where are you when you live?[/i]"
"Here" "[i]So where are you when you die?[/i]"
"There I suppose? But where is there." "[i]Where is here?[/i]"
"I'm tired of your questions to my questions. Where do we go when we die? What happens to us?" "[i]You simply die, just like you simply live.[/i]"[/b][/quote]
Discuss.

item.title: What I wrote
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:12, topic:303659”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=399949.msg2967251#msg2967251 date=1253671064]

Holy shit, I got confused.

[/quote]It’s a two person dialogue, unless you were being sarcastic.

I wasn’t being sarcastic. >.>

“There I suppose? But where is there.”
“Where is here?”

That’s what confused me lol[/quote]It’s supposed to be confusing. to the Q anyways. A (being answer) is the omnicia, a form of higher being, to know all. It’s to hard to comprehend what is further than our existence, that’s why it’s confusing in explanation. I tried to emphasize that to capture the meaning.

Read full topic

item.title: What I wrote
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:6, topic:303659"]No no, i mean like Blogspot, Wordpress etc.[/quote]I’ve used Wordpress before, but no. They don’t serve a elaborate purpose for me. They’d be more of a 3 day hobby that I’d likely get rid of, I like showing off what I do when I do it. Blogs, unless you’re an obnoxious attention whore, get no attention.

Read full topic

Good job what blogging software do you use?
[/quote]It was just something I had up on myspace, I don’t use anything special. Else I write stuff down I think about in a notebook if I can find one.

I was thinking about a MoparScape blog ;P[/quote]I was unaware MoparScape released such things…? Blogging software? I must be mislead, or a least I’m misunderstanding something about these moparscapers. I thought all they thought about was runescapes and who can got teh coolest servar.

item.title: What I wrote
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

So I was looking at my previous blogs which all consist of writing and some form of poetry? I came across this and thought it was pretty interesting. I enjoyed re-reading what I wrote, hopefully some of you see the same light in it.

[quote=“Cody”][b]“What happens when we die?”
“Well, what happens when you live?”

“We… live?”
“Okay, so same concept.”

“Well, I mean do you go somewhere, orrr…”
“Where are you when you live?”

“Here”
“So where are you when you die?”

“There I suppose? But where is there.”
“Where is here?”

“I’m tired of your questions to my questions. Where do we go when we die? What happens to us?”
“You simply die, just like you simply live.”[/b][/quote]

Discuss.

Read full topic
